0x0B. SSH

Task 00:(0-use_a_private_key)
Bash script that uses ssh to connect to your server using the private key ~/.ssh/school with the user ubuntu.

Task 01:(1-create_ssh_key_pair)
Bash script that creates an RSA key pair.

Task 02:(2-ssh_config)
Configures the SSh configuration file so that you can connect to a server without typing a password

Task 03:(0x0B-ssh)
Add the SSH public key below to your server so that we can connect using the ubuntu user.

ssh-rsa 

Task 04:(100-puppet_ssh_config.pp)
Uses Puppet to make changes to our configuration file.
